text: ftjadhb alsaharat 'amrahum baynahum wthadthu srana, qalu: 'iina musaa waharun sahran yuridan 'an yukhrijakum min biladakum bshrhma, wayadhhaba bitariqat alsihr aleazimat alty 'antum elyha, fahkmu kydkm, waezmu ealayh min ghyr aikhtilaf bynkm, thuma aytuu sfana wahdana, wa'alqawa ma fi 'aydikum maratan wahdt; ltabharu alabsar, wtghlbu sihr musaa wakhyh, waqad zufur bhajth alyawm man eala ealaa sahbh, fghlbh wqhrh
